item.title: Is it true this is against the rs rules
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

Runescape may not like it but thej wont ban u for owning or hosting one thej will try to get ure website down whit shit saying its copyrighted and stuff but i u ask something about private serving to jagex via the rs2 website thej wont anser back at all,wont get u banned nor warned

item.title: Is it true this is against the rs rules

item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

No, MoparScape is not against RuneScape rules, it doesn’t effect them in anyway, nor can they find out you use MoparScape unless you go tell some snitch and he reports you, even then you won’t get banned or anything
